markdownRemark.html: This tool was created because of the gap in text editors for multi-line search and replace. The only one I’ve found that can do it is/was Dreamweaver 4. Its powered by Silverlight.

frontmatter.title: Multi Line Search and Replace Tool
frontmatter.description: This tool was created because of the gap in text editors for multi-line search and replace. The only one I've found that can do it is/was Dreamweaver 4. Its powered by Silverlight
